configuration_values_schema.title: Elevation app configuration
configuration_values_schema.description: Back-end configuration for the elevation service to enable it to connect to Google Pub/Sub and communicate with other services.

name.description: Type of backend (in this case, it can only be GCPPubSubBackend)

project_name.description: Name of the Google Cloud Platform (GCP) project the child exists in.

credentials_environment_variable.description: Name of environment variable containing either the absolute path to a Google Cloud Platform credentials JSON file or the JSON itself as a string.

output_values_schema.title: Output values
output_values_schema.description: The elevations at the input longitudes and latitudes.
